00020 #ifndef BRICS_3D_OBJECTMODELPLANE_H_

00026 
00027 
00035 inline double
00036 pointToPlaneDistanceSigned (const Point3D &p, double a, double b, double c, double d)
00037 {
00038         return (a * p.getX() + b * p.getY() + c * p.getZ() + d);
00039 }
00040 
00045 inline double
00046 pointToPlaneDistanceSigned (const Point3D &p, const Eigen::Vector4d &plane_coefficients)
00047 {
00048         return ( plane_coefficients[0] * p.getX() + plane_coefficients[1] * p.getY() + plane_coefficients[2] * p.getZ() + plane_coefficients[3] );
00049 }
